patthana8.70:1.1: Napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.70:2.1: Naapariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.70:3.1: Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.70:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
